Class LocationMacro

public final class LocationMacro
extends BuildTargetMacro
    Macro that resolves to the output location of a build rule.

      • splitSupplementaryOutputPart

        public static com.facebook.buck.rules.macros.AbstractLocationMacro.SplitResult splitSupplementaryOutputPart(String targetish)
        Split a build target string with optional supplementary output pattern.
        Returns:
        The target part and the supplementary output part of the string.

        Note: this function simply looks for a trailing "[foo]", it does not validate that the string starts with a valid build target.
